I have been playing since childhood. The game is distinguished by a large number of people, does not lose relevance and is fun to play alone or with friends.
Many mistakes are corrected and it always becomes more and more interesting.

Skill Improvement is the key. "SKILL = GAMESENSE + AIM&SPRAY CONTROL + MOVEMENT*POSITIONING + ECONOMY
Meet all these requirements is equal to be Avatar with 4 element

The game also helps you learn basic Russian *joke
